MEDIA SESSION SERVICE (dumpsys media_session)

Sessions Stack - have 1 sessions:
  Session #0:
    ownerPackageName=com.example.music
    tag=ExampleSession
    PlaybackState {state=2, position=0, buffered position=0, speed=0.0, updated=223456, actions=0x0}
    Metadata {android.media.metadata.TITLE=Example Song (no token), android.media.metadata.ARTIST=Example Artist, android.media.metadata.ALBUM=Example Album}
    SessionToken{pkg=com.example.music type=SESSION service=com.example.music/.ExampleService}
